entities.name: hog's head
entities.description: The Hog's Head is a pub where Harry, Ron, and Hermione are sitting. It is mentioned as 'IN THE HOG'S HEAD' at the beginning of the text.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who orders three butterbeers from the barman. She says 'Three butterbeers, please'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who quickly pays for the butterbeers and passes over six Sickles to the barman. The barman's eyes travel over Harry, resting on his scar.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who murmurs about ordering anything they liked in the pub and suggests trying firewhisky.

entities.name: barman
entities.description: The barman is a man with dirty gray bandages who serves Harry, Ron, and Hermione drinks. He receives money from Harry and gives him change.

relationships.description: Harry pays the barman six Sickles for three butterbeers. The text states 'I’ll get them,' said Harry quickly, passing over the silver.'
Hermione orders three butterbeers from the barman. The text states '“Three butterbeers, please,” said Hermione.'
Ron suggests ordering firewhisky from the barman. The text states 'You know what?’ Ron murmured, looking over at the bar with enthusiasm. ‘We could order anything we liked in here...’
